text: 12|88|aṅṅane yūsuphinṟe aṭukkal kaṭann cenniṭṭ avar paṟaññu: prabhēā, ñaṅṅaḷeyuṁ ñaṅṅaḷuṭe kuṭumbattēyuṁ duritaṁ bādhiccirikkunnu. mēāśamāya carakkukaḷē ñaṅṅaḷ keāṇṭuvanniṭṭuḷḷū. atināl tāṅkaḷ ñaṅṅaḷkk aḷav tikaccutarikayuṁ, ñaṅṅaḷēāṭ audāryaṁ kāṇikkukayuṁ ceyyaṇaṁ. tīrccayāyuṁ allāhu udāramatikaḷkk pratiphalaṁ nalkunnatāṇ‌
